issues.description: The problem statement specifies that the constructor for the Lecture class must follow the exact order of attributes as shown in the UML diagram (numberOfInscribedStudents, lectureName, numberOfLecturers, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfTutors). However, the solution repository implements the constructor with a different parameter order (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors), which could confuse students if they reference the solution, as it contradicts the specified design and might lead to implementation errors.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the constructor in the solution repository to match the UML diagram order: public Lecture(int numberOfInscribedStudents, String lectureName, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfTutors) { ... }
